title: Data Engineer

title: Graduate Student Researcher
description_1: Primarily work with large hydrologic datasets, numerical groundwater flow and contaminant transport models, and network optimization models.
description_2: Developed methods to efficiently upscale anomalous contaminant transport in heterogeneous porous media thus informing regional scale groundwater quality modeling.
description_3: Regularly use R, Python, Git, Bash, MODFLOW, RW3D, Paraview, Illustrator, AWS, Linux, ArcGIS, Envi, LaTeX.

title: 2019 California Water Data Challenge (statewide)
